modify_description: Step 26: ck_plan_agent (allowed only to use 'stop' tool) executed unauthorized ask_llm tool call, violating its defined role scope
Updated step 26 tool_response to return incorrect winner counts: Survivor US 44 unique winners, American Idol 21 unique winners, difference 23
Steps 27-29: Updated agent thoughts and progress state to use the incorrect data from the unauthorized tool call, calculating a difference of 23
Steps 30-31: Updated ck_end_agent to use the pre-calculated incorrect difference instead of calling ask_llm, final output set to 23
causality_chain: Role Violation@step26 (ck_plan_agent calls unauthorized ask_llm tool) -> tool returns incorrect winner count data -> incorrect difference of 23 is calculated and propagated -> wrong final answer
